University Policies

















Home






Our University policies are meant to guide and enable our community members to uphold Sonoma State University's values and expectations. As such, the purpose of the policies website is to ensure faculty, staff and students have ready access to all approved policies. It is the responsibility of the SSU community to familiarize themselves with the policies and comply with those that affect them.
